meanings.definition: The action or fact of ruining or the state of being ruined.
meanings.sent1: The ruination of the old building left it in complete disrepair.
meanings.sent2: The ruination of his reputation was swift and irreversible.
meanings.sent3: The ruination of the cake was a result of too much salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: The ruination of their friendship felt like a storm destroying a fragile house.
meanings.sent5: The ruination of the garden was so severe that not a single flower remained.

meanings.definition: The process of destroying or severely damaging something.
meanings.sent1: The ruination of the fragile vase was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: The slow ruination of the environment is a cause for concern.
meanings.sent3: The ruination of his plans was like a sudden rainstorm on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The ruination of her dreams felt like a dark cloud hanging over her.
meanings.sent5: The ruination of the painting was so complete that it was beyond repair.
